regen.absent_element: capability to record specific telemetry elements
regen.new_specification: TCS shall provide the capability to record specific telemetry elements real-time.

regen.absent_element: lack of recording of specific telemetry elements
regen.new_specification: The system shall record all telemetry elements that are being monitored in real-time.

TCS shall alert the operator when deviations from the mission plan are significant, even if they are less than 10%, under specific conditions such as approaching restricted zones or critical mission phases.

label: TCS shall record all telemetry elements for future review and processing.
